integration.description: Details of the integration associated with the settlement

subaccount.description: Details of the subaccount associated with the settlement

settled_by.description: The entity responsible for settling the transaction

settlement_date.description: The date and time the settlement was processed

domain.description: The domain to which the settlement is related

total_amount.description: The total amount of the settlement

total_fees.description: The total fees charged for the settlement

total_processed.description: The total amount processed for the settlement

deductions.description: Details of any deductions applied to the settlement

effective_amount.description: The actual amount received after deductions

status.description: The status of the settlement (e.g., pending, processed)

createdAt.description: The date and time the settlement was created

updatedAt.description: The date and time the settlement was last updated
